entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
